Class SRP

java.lang.Object
concurrencyControlProtocol.ConcurrencyControlProtocol
concurrencyControlProtocol.implementation.PIP
concurrencyControlProtocol.implementation.SRP
Direct Known Subclasses:
MSRP
public class SRP extends PIP
Stack Resource Policy (SRP) concurrency control protocol.
Author:
ShiuJia

  • Method Details

    • preAction

      public void preAction(Processor p)
      Description copied from class: ConcurrencyControlProtocol
      Perform pre-scheduling actions for the given processor.

      Use this hook to perform any initialization or setup that must occur before scheduling begins on the specified processor. (前置作業，在排程開始前就該做得事，就寫在這個function裡)

      Overrides:
      preAction in class PIP
      Parameters:
      p - the Processor on which to perform pre-scheduling actions

    • jobArrivesAction

      Overrides:
      jobArrivesAction in class PIP
      Parameters:
      j - the arriving Job

    • checkJobFirstExecuteAction

      public boolean checkJobFirstExecuteAction(Job j)
      Description copied from class: ConcurrencyControlProtocol
      Check whether the given job should be treated as its first execution.
      Overrides:
      checkJobFirstExecuteAction in class PIP
      Parameters:
      j - the Job to check
      Returns:
      true if the job is considered to be executing for the first time and any first-execution protocol actions should be applied; false otherwise

    • checkJobLockAction

      public SharedResource checkJobLockAction(Job j, SharedResource r)
      Description copied from class: ConcurrencyControlProtocol
      Check and/or attempt to lock a shared resource on behalf of a job.

      Implementations may return the resource that was actually locked, a different resource that affects locking decisions, or null to indicate no lock was obtained. The exact meaning depends on the concrete protocol implementation.

      Overrides:
      checkJobLockAction in class PIP
      Parameters:
      j - the Job requesting or checking the lock
      r - the SharedResource the job wants to lock
      Returns:
      the SharedResource that represents the result of the lock check (e.g., the resource granted, or a resource indicating blocking), or null if no resource is granted or applicable

    • jobUnlockAction

      public void jobUnlockAction(Job j, SharedResource r)
      Description copied from class: ConcurrencyControlProtocol
      Handle unlocking of a shared resource by a job.
      Overrides:
      jobUnlockAction in class PIP
      Parameters:
      j - the Job that is unlocking the resource
      r - the SharedResource being unlocked
